                "private int ExecuteWrite(string query, Dictionary<string, object> args)\n{\n    int numberOfRowsAffected;\n\n    //setup the connection to the database\n    using (var con = new SQLiteConnection(\"Data Source=test.db\"))\n    {\n        con.Open();\n        \n        //open a new command\n        using (var cmd = new SQLiteCommand(query, con))\n        {\n            //set the arguments given in the query\n            foreach (var pair in args)\n            {\n                cmd.Parameters.AddWithValue(pair.Key, pair.Value);\n            }\n\n            //execute the query and get the number of row affected\n            numberOfRowsAffected = cmd.ExecuteNonQuery();\n        }\n\n        return numberOfRowsAffected;\n    }\n}"

                "private int EditUser(User user)\n{\n    const string query = \"UPDATE User SET FirstName = @firstName, LastName = @lastName WHERE Id = @id\";\n\n    //here we are setting the parameter values that will be actually \n    //replaced in the query in Execute method\n    var args = new Dictionary<string, object>\n    {\n        {\"@id\", user.Id},\n        {\"@firstName\", user.FirstName},\n        {\"@lastName\", user.Lastname}\n    };\n\n    return ExecuteWrite(query, args);\n}"

            "language": [["C#"]],
            "title": [
              [
                "private DataTable Execute(string query)\n{\n    if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(query.Trim()))\n        return null;\n\n    using (var con = new SQLiteConnection(\"Data Source=test.db\"))\n    {\n        con.Open();\n        using (var cmd = new SQLiteCommand(query, con))\n        {\n            foreach (KeyValuePair<string, object> entry in args)\n            {\n                cmd.Parameters.AddWithValue(entry.Key, entry.Value);\n            }\n\n            var da = new SQLiteDataAdapter(cmd);\n\n            var dt = new DataTable();\n            da.Fill(dt);\n\n            da.Dispose();\n            return dt;\n        }\n    }\n}"
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",

          "alive": true,
          "created_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "created_by_id": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "created_by_table": "notion_user",
          "created_time": 1549529794133,
          "id": "b1a89713-977b-443d-a123-944b8782016f",
          "ignore_block_count": true,
          "last_edited_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "last_edited_by_id": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "last_edited_by_table": "notion_user",
          "last_edited_time": 1550221860000,
          "parent_id": "3d1c8bc9-7432-423d-ba85-54b9435e6d48",
          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
            "language": [["C#"]],
            "title": [
              [
                "private User GetUserById(int id)\n{\n    var query = \"SELECT * FROM User WHERE Id = @id\";\n\n    var args = new Dictionary<string, object>\n    {\n        {\"@id\", id}\n    };\n\n    DataTable dt = ExecuteRead(query, args);\n\n    if (dt == null || dt.Rows.Count == 0)\n    {\n        return null;\n    }\n\n    var user = new User\n    {\n        Id = Convert.ToInt32(dt.Rows[0][\"Id\"]),\n        FirstName = Convert.ToString(dt.Rows[0][\"FirstName\"]),\n        Lastname = Convert.ToString(dt.Rows[0][\"LastName\"])\n    };\n\n    return user;\n}"
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "code",
          "version": 12
        }
      },

          "parent_id": "3d1c8bc9-7432-423d-ba85-54b9435e6d48",
          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
            "language": [["C#"]],
            "title": [
              [
                "private int AddUser(User user)\n{\n    const string query = \"INSERT INTO User(FirstName, LastName) VALUES(@firstName, @lastName)\";\n\n    //here we are setting the parameter values that will be actually \n    //replaced in the query in Execute method\n    var args = new Dictionary<string, object>\n    {\n        {\"@firstName\", user.FirstName},\n        {\"@lastName\", user.Lastname}\n    };\n\n    return ExecuteWrite(query, args);\n}"
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "code",
          "version": 11
        }
      },

          "last_edited_by_table": "notion_user",
          "last_edited_time": 1549529794130,
          "parent_id": "3d1c8bc9-7432-423d-ba85-54b9435e6d48",
          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
